text: Primary immunodeficiency (PID) is a disorder in which the immune system does not function normally1 . In addition to the increased risk of infection, autoimmune disorders are often observed in PID.1.
title: Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Associated with Activated Phosphoinositide-3-kinase Delta Syndrome, Type 2.
